title: e to the pi times i
alt: I have never been totally satisfied by the explanations for why e to the ix gives a sinusoidal wave.
transcript:
[Two people standing at a board with writing on. One person is pointing at the board.]
Cueball: Numbers of the form n√-1 are "imaginary," but can still be used in equations.
Friend: Okay.
Cueball: And e^(π√-1)=-1.
Friend: Now you're just fucking with me.
